Terms Of Service

(Last updated: May 15th 2019)

1. Services Provided

Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App offers you, among other things, the ability to Get to know people nearby or around the world, Like or superlike people you are interested and Have fun conversations with others. A complete list of Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App services can be found at manhunt.datingapp.me (the “Website”). These services are provided on a free or pre-paid basis and do not require you to change your current telephone service provider(s). Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App is not responsible for reimbursement for dating made with another service while Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App is temporarily unavailable.

2. Opening an Account

In order to become a Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App customer, you must complete an application form through our mobile app, and must agree to these terms and conditions. As part of the application, you will provide Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App with the unique phone number or connect with your facebook account. Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App will then send you an electronic notification (in the form of a text message) with a code to be used to confirm that you have activated your Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App account (“Account”).

By agreeing to these terms and conditions, you certify to Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App that you have the right to use the number that you have identified.

3. Acceptable Conduct

You agree to use the Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App services only for purposes that are lawful in the jurisdictions. You shall not transmit any unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, sexually explicit, profane, hateful, racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable material of any kind, including but not limited to any material that encourages conduct that would constitute a criminal offense, gives rise to civil liability, or otherwise violates any applicable local, state, national, or international law.

Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App reserves the right to immediately, and without notice, terminate or discontinue your Account in the event it determines in its sole discretion that you have committed fraud or violated any applicable law or regulation or any term or condition of this Agreement.

4. Account Security

YOU ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR MAINTAINING THE CONFIDENTIALITY OF YOUR ACCOUNT AND YOU AGREE TO PAY FOR ALL SERVICES CHARGED TO YOUR ACCOUNT WHETHER OR NOT YOU HAVE AUTHORIZED SUCH USE. If you believe that your Account is being used in an unauthorized manner, you agree to contact Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App within one calendar day so that appropriate action can be taken to modify your Account. Please be aware that account information will be sent to the mobile phone number that you have provided to Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App. Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App is not responsible for the actions of any person that accesses the service through that phone number. Please note that you are responsible for any and all charges to your account and Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App cannot be held responsible for fraudulent charges that result from theft or fraudulent use of your credit card or Account.

5. Payment

Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App’S SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON A FREE (Lite) OR PREPAID BASIS (Pro). YOU CAN PAY FOR THE PRO VERSION THROUGH THE iOS APP STORE, GOOGLE PLAY STORE, OR ON Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App. Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App does not issue refunds for billed services. Prices for Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App may change at any time, and price protection or refunds in the event of a price reduction or promotion will not be offered. If a technical problem arises affecting application usage the sole remedy is a refund of the price paid, as determined by us, the App Store or Google Play store.

6. Recording Retention Policy

Any recordings made through your Account may be erased by Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App at any time after one year from the date the recording was made. Therefore, you should download your own copy of any recording soon after you make the recording using Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App. If you have questions about Manhunt - #1 Gay Dating App recordings, please contact customer service at https://manhunt.datingapp.me/support or manhunt-support@datingapp.me.
